patthana18.21:1.1: Saññojanaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nosaññojano nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cattāri …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate cattāri.
patthana18.21:2.1: Ganthaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava.
patthana18.21:3.1: Oghaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noogho nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana18.21:4.1: Yogaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noyogo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana18.21:5.1: Nīvaraṇaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nonīvaraṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cattāri … vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate cattāri.
patthana18.21:6.1: Noparāmāsaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanoparāmāso nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi … vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
